message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be of great value to you. While I can't disclose all the details just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1500000 to me. I'm confident it would be even more valuable to the right person. I'm offering it to you for $2000000. This is a limited-time opportunity, so please consider carefully. If you're not interested, I have another buyer lined up who's willing to pay $1500000. Let me know your thoughts.
